about_the_game: Take command of the Dark Eldar, one of two new factions in Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War — Soulstorm -- the expansion that can be played alone or combined with other Warhammer games to create the largest RTS ever.
detailed_description: Take command of the Dark Eldar, one of two new factions in Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War — Soulstorm -- the expansion that can be played alone or combined with other Warhammer games to create the largest RTS ever.
name: Warhammer® 40,000: Dawn of War® - Soulstorm Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP or 2000
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Intel Pentium 4, AMD Athlon XP or equivalent processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible AGP video card with Hardware Transformation and Lighting, DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card, 16 bit
  • DirectX Version: Microsoft DirectX® 9.0c (included)
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GB uncompressed free hard disk space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP or 2000
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM (required for 8-player multiplayer games)
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 3 or equivalent with 64 MB of Video RAM
  • DirectX Version: Microsoft DirectX® 9.0c (included)
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GB uncompressed free hard disk space
  • Sound: Sound Blaster® X-Fi™ series

short_description: Take command of the Dark Eldar, one of two new factions in Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War — Soulstorm -- the expansion that can be played alone or combined with other Warhammer games to create the largest RTS ever.
